<div class="text-regular">Overview of all categorised climbs in Tour de France 2021.</div>
<div class="mt10"><form action="race.php"><ul class="filter horizontal"><li><div class="label">Mountain range</div><div><select class="" name="mountain_range" style=""><option value="" selected="">-</option><option value="0">-</option><option value="1">Alps</option><option value="14">Armorican Massif</option><option value="3">Massif Central</option><option value="18">Morvan</option><option value="2">Pyrenees</option></select></div></li>

<tr class=" hide"><td>23</td><td><a href="location/cormet-de-roselend">Cormet de Roselend</a></td><td><a href="race/tour-de-france/2021/stage-9">Stage 9</a></td><td>6.6</td><td>5.9</td></tr>

<tr class=" hide"><td>25</td><td><a href="location/cote-d-aspret-sarrat">Côte d'Aspret-Sarrat</a></td><td><a href="race/tour-de-france/2021/stage-16">Stage 16</a></td><td>6.3</td><td>0.9</td></tr>
</tbody></table><a class="showFullList showmorelink" href="">show more</a></span></div>
<div class="mt50"><h3>Hardest</h3><div class="text-regular">For each climb we compute the climb profileScore. Instead of the average steepness, the climb profileScore looks at each 200 meter segment in the climb. </div></div>

<span class="table-cont"><table class="basic" style="max-width: 650px; "><thead><tr><th style="width: 8.3%; ">#</th><th style="width: 33.3%; ">Climb</th><th style="width: 16.7%; ">Stage</th><th style="width: 8.3%; ">Steepness (%)</th><th style="width: 8.3%; ">Length (km)</th><th style="width: 25%; ">profileScore</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>1</td><td><a href="location/mont-ventoux">Mont Ventoux</a></td><td><a href="race/tour-de-france/2021/stage-11">Stage 11</a></td><td>7.5</td><td>15.8</td><td><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left magenta3" style="width: 80%;  height: 14px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 14px; ">306</span></div></td></tr>
<tr><td>2</td><td><a href="location/col-du-tourmalet">Col du Tourmalet</a></td><td><a href="race/tour-de-france/2021/stage-18">Stage 18</a></td><td>7.4</td><td>17</td><td><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left magenta3" style="width: 67.2%;  height: 14px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 14px; ">257</span></div></td></tr>
<tr><td>3</td><td><a href="location/col-de-romme">Col de Romme</a></td><td><a href="race/tour-de-france/2021/stage-8">Stage 8</a></td><td>8.9</td><td>8.8</td><td><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left magenta3" style="width: 57.3%;  height: 14px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 14px; ">219</span></div></td></tr>
<tr><td>4</td><td><a href="location/luz-ardiden">Luz Ardiden</a></td><td><a href="race/tour-de-france/2021/stage-18">Stage 18</a></td><td>7.5</td><td>13.4</td><td><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left magenta3" style="width: 52%;  height: 14px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 14px; ">198.8</span></div></td></tr>
